Articles.Content: KSP crashes when i try to enter. It is beacuse of a mod called Kerbal Konstructs That works with another mod called Kerbinside. I tried removing Kerbal Konstructs from my gamedata folder and it didn`t Crash but kerbinside didn`t work either. I tried putting kerbinside in a Kerbal Konstructs folder called Exportedinstances beacuse i read that, that could help but it didn`t it still crashed. Does Anybody know a solution for this problem? Sorry if my english is bad.

1 hour ago, Den_Tykke_Kat said:

KSP crashes when i try to enter. It is beacuse of a mod called Kerbal Konstructs That works with another mod called Kerbinside. I tried removing Kerbal Konstructs from my gamedata folder and it didn`t Crash but kerbinside didn`t work either. I tried putting kerbinside in a Kerbal Konstructs folder called Exportedinstances beacuse i read that, that could help but it didn`t it still crashed. Does Anybody know a solution for this problem? Sorry if my english is bad.
